commands.google:
import time
print('Pinging google.com [8.8.8.8] with 32 bytes of data:')
time.sleep(0.5)
print('Reply from 8.8.8.8: bytes=32 time=10ms TTL=118')
time.sleep(0.5)
print('Reply from 8.8.8.8: bytes=32 time=11ms TTL=118')
time.sleep(0.5)
print('Reply from 8.8.8.8: bytes=32 time=12ms TTL=118')
print('\nPing statistics for 8.8.8.8: Packets: Sent = 3, Received = 3, Lost = 0 (0% loss)')
commands.localhost:
import time
print('Pinging localhost [127.0.0.1] with 32 bytes of data:')
time.sleep(0.1)
print('Reply from 127.0.0.1: bytes=32 time<1ms TTL=64')
time.sleep(0.1)
print('Reply from 127.0.0.1: bytes=32 time<1ms TTL=64')
time.sleep(0.1)
print('Reply from 127.0.0.1: bytes=32 time<1ms TTL=64')
print('\nPing statistics for 127.0.0.1: Packets: Sent = 3, Received = 3, Lost = 0 (0% loss)')
